name: Blaster Fighter
description:
CONTROLS: P1:P2:WASDArrow KeysF to PunchO to PunchG to SpecialP to SpecialF+G to BlastO+P to blast A button to Punch and Select, B button to Special and Back, D-pad for navigation, Shoulder buttons to change difficulty, Start to pause. FIGHTING:
  • Each fighter has a Punch, Special, Up-Special, and Blast ability. Read about each champion's unique abilities in the Guide.
  • Some moves are counters, meaning if the button is pressed right as your opponent is attacking, it deals back your opponent's damage.
  • Falling off the stage causes you to lose a stock.
  • Reduce your opponents health and stocks to 0 to win!
BLASTING:
  • Hold FG or OP at the exact same time to blast.
  • Fill your blast meter by landing punches. 
  • Using special abilities deals more damage than regular punches, but fills your opponent's blast meter instead of yours.
  • Blasts are super powerful but must be used in the right way- read about each blast in the Guide.
UPDATE:

1.6: Two new stages, Champions Arena and Streets! Combos are back, with lots of new character sound effects!
